title: A Hush of Greek
description: The love god Eros has lost his belief in love and refuses to shoot his arrows. Zeus is furious and orders Triton, Dionysius, and Hermes to do something about it. Now the trio has their hands full with their disillusioned friend. And what better way to make Eros believe in love again than to make him FALL IN LOVE?
author: Tina Folsom
